audio.electronic_desc: Modern synthesizer sounds, ideal for tech-focused study environments
audio.piano_desc: Soft piano chords and arpeggios, creating a calm study atmosphere
audio.nature_desc: Natural environment sounds, including birds, water, and wind chimes

donate.title: Thank You for Your Support!
donate.message: Your donation helps me continue improving Focus Flow and developing more useful tools.

guide.title: Install to Home Screen
guide.message: In Safari, tap the share button then select 'Add to Home Screen' to install the app to your device.
guide.step2: Scroll and select 'Add to Home Screen'

about.title: About Focus Flow
about.description: Focus Flow is a smart learning timer based on neuroscience principles, promoting memory consolidation through random reminders.
about.author: Developed by

notifications.pleaseSetTime: Please set total time and stage time
notifications.stageComplete: Stage complete! Time for a break
notifications.shortBreakStarted: Time's up! Close your eyes and review what you've learned
